name: Secret of Stormlot
description:
This game is similar to Suikoden in terms of game-play (Recruitable characters, turn-based battles etc.).

Story Overview
The castle of Stormlot is in a shocked state after hearing about a murder that occurred in a nearby forest.
While the king of this castle is trying to figure out who is behind this, his son, Fralon is out on his first mission after joining the soldier ranks. But, there is more to this incident than a simple murder as it later becomes apparent. Can the king find the killer before a catastrophe occurs in Stormlot?

Features of this game

  • Over 10 hours of game-play
  • Custom-edited battle char-sets.
  • Almost everything in the game is examinable.
  • 18 recruitable characters
  • 13 Playable characters
  • Mini-map with indicator for every dungeon
